channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和妮基-黑莉（Nikki Haley）周六在南卡罗来纳州的共和党初选中正面交锋，前总统有望在她的家乡击败他的前助手，并加强对党内提名的控制。
item.description:
Donald Trump and Nikki Haley were going head-to-head Saturday in South Carolina's Republican primary, with the ex-president poised to trounce his former charge in her home state and tighten his grip on the party's nomination https://t.co/PW6kutObuR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #美国和英国袭击也门 18 个胡蒂目标：五角大楼
item.description:
#BREAKING US, UK strike 18 Huthi targets in Yemen: Pentagon pic.twitter.com/WSCONok7k6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 数百名塞内加尔人周六在达喀尔举行了支持和反对总统麦基-萨勒的示威游行。
item.description:
Hundreds of Senegalese demonstrated in Dakar on Saturday both for and against President Macky Sall with the country mired in political crisis following his postponement of this month's presidential election https://t.co/0MZLgHUPJJ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: "法国塞内加尔籍导演马蒂-迪奥普拍摄的纪录片《达荷美》（Dahomey），探究了围绕欧洲向非洲归还掠夺文物的棘手问题，获得了柏林电影节的最高奖项
item.description:
"Dahomey", a documentary by Franco-Senegalese director Mati Diop probing the thorny issues surrounding Europe's return of looted antiquities to Africa, won the Berlin film festival's top prize https://t.co/5vyqjn9Zyf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 阿莱克斯-伊沃比（Alex Iwobi）在第 97 分钟的进球让富勒姆取得了自 2003 年以来在老特拉福德球场的首场胜利，曼联的乐观情绪被打破，而阿斯顿维拉则以 4-2 的比分击败诺丁汉森林，排名上升至第四位。
item.description:
Manchester United's air of optimism was punctured as Alex Iwobi's 97th minute winner handed Fulham their first win at Old Trafford since 2003, while Aston Villa surged clear in fourth by beating Nottingham Forest 4-2 https://t.co/eGvTHgrHWr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #苏格兰在六国橄榄球赛中以 30-21 的比分击败英格兰
item.description:
#BREAKING Scotland beat England 30-21 in Six Nations rugby pic.twitter.com/U1zduEhpzH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）访问基辅期间，两国签署了一项安全协议，加拿大周六表示，今年将向乌克兰提供 30.2 亿加元（22 亿美元）的财政和军事支持。
item.description:
Canada said on Saturday it would provide 3.02 billion Canadian dollars ($2.2 billion) in financial and military support for Ukraine this year, as the two countries signed a security agreement on Canadian PM Justin Trudeau's visit in Kyiv.https://t.co/TeJ5XyOs7P

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 法国埃菲尔铁塔因罢工于周一关闭，在纪念碑管理方 SETE 宣布与工会达成协议后，铁塔将于周日重新开放。这是该景点两个月内的第二次罢工。
item.description:
France's Eiffel Tower, that had been closed since Monday by a strike, will reopen Sunday, after monument's management SETE announced a deal had been struck with unions. The stoppage was the second within two months at the site.https://t.co/yyHdtkBtR7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #爱尔兰在六国赛中以 31-7 大胜威尔士#AFPSports
item.description:
#BREAKING Ireland beat Wales 31-7 in Six Nations#AFPSports pic.twitter.com/ZpjzTATqrs

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #BREAKING Navalny's body given to his mother：纳瓦尔尼发言人
item.description:
#BREAKING Navalny's body given to his mother: Navalny spokesperson pic.twitter.com/dXarMAj6JM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 英格兰的初级医生--专家、顾问级别以下的医生--从格林尼治标准时间周六上午7点开始再次举行为期五天的罢工，因为他们与政府之间旷日持久的薪酬之争仍在继续，几乎没有打破僵局的迹象：
item.description:
Junior doctors -- those below specialist, consultant level -- in England kicked off another five-day strike from Saturday 0700 GMT, as their protracted pay battle with the government rumbles on with few signs of a break in the deadlock.
Full story: https://t.co/j8OAWGwwEe pic.twitter.com/5L7HIIO6XW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 在一名高级政府官员公开承认在 2 月 8 日的投票中操纵选票后，社交媒体平台 X 于上周六在巴基斯坦瘫痪。在过去一周里，该平台只能断断续续地运行。➡️
item.description:
Social media platform X was downed in Pakistan last Saturday, after a senior government official made a public admission of vote manipulation in the February 8 poll. Over the past week, it has been operational only intermittently.
➡️ https://t.co/8a9sfPacYx pic.twitter.com/YXo73uCksH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 尽管西方国家对莫斯科实施禁运，并对其全球石油销售设置油价上限，但莫斯科越来越依赖于所有权不透明或没有适当保险的幽灵油轮船队来继续出口石油。更多信息
item.description:
Moscow increasingly relies on ghost fleet of tankers, with opaque ownership or without proper insurance, to keep exporting oil, despite a Western-imposed embargo and oil price cap on its global sales.
Read more: https://t.co/6hd1uMZ78O pic.twitter.com/Gv8C22O2hz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 英国首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）在俄罗斯全面入侵两周年之际誓言基辅将 "取得胜利"，英国周六宣布为乌克兰提供 2.45 亿英镑（约合 3.11 亿美元）的新防御计划。这笔资金将用于 "急需的炮弹"。➡️
item.description:
Britain announced Saturday a new £245m ($311m) defence package for Ukraine, as PM Rishi Sunak vowed on the second anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion that Kyiv will "prevail". The funding will go towards "urgently needed artillery ammunition".
➡️ https://t.co/jUNQoB1vr5 pic.twitter.com/4QR9gawKZT

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 奥地利当局周六正在调查周五晚上在维也纳贫困的布里吉滕瑙区发生的杀害五名妇女的案件，其中包括在一家妓院发现的三名被残忍刺死的妇女：
item.description:
Austrian authorities were on Saturday investigating the killings of five women in Vienna's underprivileged Brigittenau district on Friday night, including three found brutally stabbed to death in a brothel.
Read more: https://t.co/KYru7wHETr pic.twitter.com/QlebY2Lm2u

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 据美国媒体报道，北美航空航天防御司令部（NORAD）称，周五，一个在美国犹他州上空高空漂浮的小型气球被战斗机拦截，但被认为不会对国家安全或飞行构成威胁。
item.description:
A small balloon floating at a high altitude over the US state of Utah was intercepted by fighter aircraft on Friday but deemed to pose no national security or flight risk, the North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) said, according to US media.https://t.co/pGXS6ODUCz

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 🎿 原定于周六在 Val di Fassa 举行的女子世界杯 super-G 比赛因大雪取消。#AFPSports➡️
item.description:
🎿 The women's World Cup super-G race at Val di Fassa scheduled for Saturday was cancelled due to heavy snow.#AFPSports
➡️ https://t.co/4FGx8xMpGk pic.twitter.com/n4YIvOFlGN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 从迪赛尔（Diesel）到古驰（Gucci），米兰 FW 24-25 女装系列的 50 多场时装秀吸引了来自世界各地的客人，其中许多人看起来几乎一模一样。"法特玛-胡萨姆说："这完全正常。"因为毕竟，这些品牌到底能生产多少衣服呢？"➡️。
item.description:
Over 50 catwalk shows on the women's FW 24-25 in Milan from Diesel to Gucci draw guests from all over the world, many looking near identical. "It's completely normal," Fatma Husam said. "Because after all, how many clothes do these brands make anyway?"
➡️ https://t.co/eV8epIEFby pic.twitter.com/u8QwoX8kjh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #国王查理三世赞扬乌克兰人的 "决心和力量
item.description:
#BREAKING King Charles III hails 'determination and strength' of Ukrainians pic.twitter.com/egtL0ZTebZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚八号种子乔丹-汤普森（Jordan Thompson）克服了头号种子亚历山大-兹维列夫（Alexander Zverev）的顽强抵抗，闯入了在墨西哥洛斯卡沃斯举行的 ATP 硬地赛决赛，他将在决赛中对阵卡斯帕-鲁德（Casper Ruud）。
item.description:
🎾 Jordan Thompson, the Australian eighth seed, overcame determined resistance by top-seeded Alexander Zverev to reach the final of the ATP hardcourt tournament in Los Cabos, Mexico where he will face Casper Ruud.#AFPSportshttps://t.co/7q5rbTvmma

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 👠一位香港官员证实，迪奥推迟了下个月在香港举行的时装秀，这对香港这个金融中心通过大型活动促进经济发展的雄心造成了打击。 完整报道：
item.description:
👠 Dior has postponed a fashion show set to be held in Hong Kong next month, a city official confirmed, dealing a blow to the financial hub's ambitions to boost its economy through major events. Full story: https://t.co/4RWwJKXL71 pic.twitter.com/Ezm3F98gGf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #泽伦斯基在战争周年纪念仪式上表示："我们会赢的
item.description:
#BREAKING 'We will win' Zelensky says at war anniversary ceremony pic.twitter.com/L1utTAjzlh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的遗孀尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜亚（Yulia Navalnaya）说，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京九天前在北极监狱去世后，亲自下令不得将他的遗体交给他的家人。完整报道
item.description:
Alexei Navalny's widow, Yulia Navalnaya, said Russian President Vladimir Putin had personally ordered that his arch critic's body should not be handed over to his family after his death in an Arctic jail nine days ago.
Full story: https://t.co/qCE74tvgpE pic.twitter.com/O2jXjmvcH5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 🎥 英国《银幕》（Screen）杂志的国际影评人投票显示，伊朗苦乐参半的爱情片《我最爱的蛋糕》（My Favourite Cake）和奥地利极度暴力的影片《魔鬼浴场》（The Devil's Bath）在周六颁奖晚会前成为柏林电影节的最大竞争者。
item.description:
🎥 An international critics' poll by Britain's Screen magazine showed the bittersweet Iranian romance "My Favourite Cake" and Austria's ultraviolent "The Devil's Bath" as the biggest contenders at the Berlin film festival ahead of awards night Saturday.https://t.co/hyj9Y3woIi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 日本一家广受欢迎的 Hello Kitty 主题游乐园的经营者说，该游乐园在收到一封 "恐怖主义威胁邮件 "后于周六关闭了一天。位于首都东京的 Sanrio Puroland 以其游乐设施、表演和可爱的卡通吉祥物而闻名。➡️
item.description:
A popular Hello Kitty-themed amusement park in Japan closed for the day on Saturday after receiving an "email threatening terrorism", its operator said. Sanrio Puroland in the capital Tokyo is known for its rides, shows and cutesy cartoon mascots.
➡️ https://t.co/YneHHckUBk pic.twitter.com/IHjlXshRFP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 北约组织领导人延斯-斯托尔滕贝格周六敦促乌克兰及其盟国不要 "失去信心"，因为俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京在战争爆发两年后继续发动血腥攻势，而乌克兰兵力薄弱的部队正努力守住前线。➡️。
item.description:
NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg on Saturday urged Ukraine and its allies not to "lose heart" as Russian President Vladimir Putin presses his bloody offensive two years into the war and as Ukraine's outgunned troops are struggling to hold the front line.
➡️ https://t.co/F5Ob9IiRCR pic.twitter.com/Ls8JYeXfuK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 视频2022 年 2 月 24 日，俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，发动了二战以来欧洲最大规模的战争。分析人士称，2024 年将是激烈战斗的又一年，乌克兰决心夺回失去的领土。
item.description:
VIDEO: On 24 February 2022, Russia invaded Ukraine, launching the biggest war in Europe since World War II. Two years on, there is still no end in sight to the war, Analysts say 2024 will be another year of fierce fighting with Ukraine determined to recapture lost territory. pic.twitter.com/u3L0CXKetk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #半导体巨头台积电的创始人张铭顺（Morris Chang）在开业典礼上表示，台积电在日本的新工厂将提高全球微芯片供应的弹性，这是这位 92 岁高龄的老人罕见地公开露面。
item.description:
#BREAKING TSMC's new plant in Japan will boost the resilience of global microchip supplies, the semiconductor giant's founder Morris Chang says at its opening ceremony, a rare public appearance by the 92-year-old pic.twitter.com/WC8KWHgmhf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 周五在法国举行的恺撒奖颁奖典礼上，《摔跤吧！爸爸》获得了包括最佳影片在内的六项大奖。但是，女演员朱迪斯-戈德雷什（Judith Godreche）却让当晚的得奖者和失利者黯然失色，她上台谴责了行业内的性虐待....。
item.description:
'Anatomy of a Fall' was the big winner at Friday's Cesar Awards in France, with six trophies including best film.

But the night's winners and losers were eclipsed by actress Judith Godreche, who took to the stage to denounce sexual abuse within the industry.… pic.twitter.com/R2rwKBrU4o

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 中国南京一栋居民楼发生火灾，当局称至少有 15 人死亡。另有 44 人受伤，其中一人伤势严重。这是近几个月来中国发生的一系列致命火灾中的最新一起
item.description:
At least 15 people have died in a fire that tore through a residential building in China's Nanjing, authorities said. Another 44 were injured, with one in critical condition.
It's the latest in a series of deadly blazes in the country in recent months https://t.co/lyb41323v0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024
